title: Alien: Earth
overview: When the mysterious deep space research vessel USCSS Maginot crash-lands on Earth, Wendy and a ragtag group of tactical soldiers make a fateful discovery that puts them face-to-face with the planet's greatest threat.
reason: This highly anticipated entry in the iconic 'Alien' franchise, led by acclaimed creator Noah Hawley, boasts an impressive 85 Metacritic score and over 82,000 pre-release IMDb votes, indicating massive public and critical anticipation.

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: Helmed by "Mare of Easttown" creator Brad Ingelsby and starring A-lister Mark Ruffalo on HBO, this drama has already generated significant buzz with an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45,000 pre-release votes.

title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: From legendary 'Breaking Bad' creator Vince Gilligan, this Apple TV+ series has garnered exceptional pre-release excitement, evidenced by an 8.6 IMDb rating from over 26,000 votes and an 86 Metacritic score.

title: Black Rabbit
overview: A rising-star restaurateur is forced into New York's criminal underworld when his chaotic brother returns to town with loan sharks on his trail.
reason: Featuring A-list stars Jason Bateman and Jude Law on Netflix, this highly anticipated drama has achieved a solid 7.4 IMDb rating from over 27,000 pre-release votes, driven by its prominent cast.

title: IT: Welcome to Derry
overview: In 1962, a couple with their son move to Derry, Maine just as a young boy disappears. With their arrival, very bad things begin to happen in the town.
reason: As a prequel to the hugely popular 'IT' film franchise, this HBO mystery drama benefits from strong brand recognition and the prestige of its network and acclaimed creators, the Muschietti siblings.
